attributes.action: Replace Theresa May as PM with Kenneth Clarke, in the interests of security.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK is potentially facing the greatest threats to our security. 

PM, Theresa May, is failing to protect the UKs needs, and we have no credible opposition party. 

Kenneth Clarke, has a solid background in protecting our national interests.
attributes.background: Replace Theresa May as PM with the right honourable gentleman Kenneth Clarke, in the interests of the UKs security and economy.

rejection.details:
In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
